thread.title: Free no-sew patterns for Halloween costumes for kids.
thread.title_full: Free no-sew patterns for Halloween costumes for kids. - Sun Sentinel

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Free no-sew patterns for Halloween costumes for kids.
text:
Get free no-sew patterns to make cute kids costumes for Halloween from Jo-Ann Fabric.
Download directions and make lions and lady bugs out of felt with a glue gun. Other patterns: pumpkin, bat, bee, cat, dog, Indian princess or witch. There's also a handy measurment chart.
Making a costume is a fun fall project for little ghosts and gobblins.
If you head to the store, here's a link to 50-percent off coupons .
Click here for the deal.
